content:
The lavender scented candle will be a lovely addition to the gift. It's great that you're drawing inspiration from your previous gift-giving experiences, and it's even more special that you're thinking of your aunt's preferences when choosing a gift for your mom.

I'm sure your mom will appreciate the thought and effort you're putting into selecting a gift that resonates with her tastes. The lavender candle will not only complement the vase but also create a soothing and calming atmosphere in her home.

It's also wonderful that you got a great deal on the vase from West Elm! $20 is an excellent price for a beautiful vase, and I'm sure your aunt appreciated the gift.

Remember, the personal touches and thoughtful considerations you're adding to the gift will make it even more special and meaningful to your mom. You're showing her that you care about her preferences and are willing to go the extra mile to make her happy.

I hope your mom loves the gift, and I'm sure she'll appreciate the love and thoughtfulness you've put into selecting it. Happy birthday to your mom, and I hope she has a wonderful celebration!
